title: Rainy city driving, almost stopped at intersection
caption: Red car driving on a rainy city street, stopping at an intersection.

description: The video shows a red car driving on a rainy city street. The car is almost stopped at an intersection, with other cars and pedestrians visible in the surroundings. The road is wet and slippery, and the visibility is reduced due to the rain. There are several traffic lights and street signs visible in the scene.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving cautiously due to the rainy weather conditions. It slows down and stops at the intersection, checking for oncoming traffic and pedestrians. The vehicle's sensors detect the presence of other cars and pedestrians, and the driver adjusts the speed and direction accordingly to ensure safe navigation through the intersection.
